docs.text: Hypercube Tools ¶ A place for helpful tools. hyper-bump-it ¶ hyper-bump-it is a command line tool for updating the version in project files needed for the next release. TimeSlip ¶ TimeSlip allows test cases to manipulate time by providing a concrete java.time.Clock implementation that will operate in a deterministic way, independent of the actual passage of time.
docs.title: Hypercube Tools
